verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> the way <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north:<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H3957>room<s%> that was over against the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> and which was over against the <S%H1146>building<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Over against the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> cubits which belonged to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and over against the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> which belonged to the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> was <S%H862>gallery<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H862>gallery<s%> in the third <S%H7992>story.<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> was a <S%H4109>walk<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>' <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6442>inward,<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit;<s%> and their <S%H6607>doors<s%> were toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

Now the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H3957>rooms<s%> were <S%H7114>shorter;<s%> for the <S%H862>galleries<s%> took <S%H398>away<s%> from <S%H2007>these,<s%> more than from the <S%H8481>lower<s%> and the <S%H8484>middle,<s%> in the <S%H1146>building.<s%>

For they were in <S%H8027>three<s%> <S%H5982>stories,<s%> and they didn't have pillars as the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>courts:<s%> therefore the uppermost was <S%H680>straitened<s%> more than the <S%H8481>lowest<s%> and the <S%H8484>middle<s%> from the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

The <S%H1447>wall<s%> that was <S%H2351>outside<s%> by the <S%H5980>side<s%> of the <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> <S%H5980>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

For the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> that were in the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and <S%H6440>behold,<s%> before the <S%H1964>temple<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>
From under these <S%H3957>rooms<s%> was the <S%H3996>entry<s%> on the east <S%H6921>side,<s%> as one <S%H935>goes<s%> into <S%H2007>them<s%> from the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

In the <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1444>wall<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1146>building,<s%> there were <S%H1508>rooms.<s%>

The <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the way of the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> which were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north;<s%> according to their <S%H753>length<s%> so was their <S%H3651>breadth:<s%> and all their <S%H4161>exits<s%> were both according to their <S%H4941>fashions,<s%> and according to their <S%H6607>doors.<s%>

According to the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> that were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> was a <S%H6607>door<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> even the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1903>directly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1448>wall<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> as one enters into <S%H935>them.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6828>me,<s%> The north <S%H3957>rooms<s%> and the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> which are <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> they are the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>rooms,<s%> where the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who are <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> there shall they <S%H3240>lay<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

When the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H935>in,<s%> then shall they not go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> but there they shall <S%H3240>lay<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> in which they <S%H8334>minister;<s%> for they are <S%H6944>holy:<s%> and they shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> to that which pertains to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H4060>measuring<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> on the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

He turned <S%H5437>about<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>side,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides:<s%> it had a <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H753>it,<s%> the length <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> to make a <S%H914>separation<s%> between that which was <S%H6944>holy<s%> and that which was <S%H2455>common.<s%>
